title: Utf8b8jfqg Fomo Fake Out
text:
Synopsis
Fidelity Digital Assets suggests 2025 could be a pivotal year for crypto adoption, emphasizing sustainable integration over speculative excitement, with bitcoin currently hovering around $90,000.

Key Insights
- Fidelity Digital Assets research director Chris Kuiper believes 2025 may be the year digital assets begin to "cross the chasm" into mainstream adoption
- Bitcoin is currently trading in the lower $90,000 range
- Most analysts are pointing to a bullish outlook for 2025
- The focus is shifting from speculative trading to long-term, sustainable digital asset integration across multiple industries
- Fidelity suggests the current market is still in early stages of meaningful adoption, despite significant price appreciation
